Spherica®

Polymer-based particles for a wide range of applications.

Monosized metal-coated polymer particles

Spherica®

  • Commercial volume capacity with stable particle quality
  • Excellent conductivity for metal-coated particles
  • Uniform and unique properties in a large variety of sizes
  • Cost-saving potential
  • Scalable technology suitable for high volume applications

Spherica® products

Conpart’s product portfolio of polymer-based particles both with and without metal coating are all based on our unique particle technology. Spherica® product series covers a wide range of particle sizes and metal coatings targeted towards gap spacer applications and conductive adhesives, for end customers within the fields of electronics, displays and solar modules.

Spherica® N

For Gap spacer

Spherica® Ag

For Solar electronics, die attach

Spherica® Au

For Display

Spherica® Ni

For Display
